name: PureNet
tagline: Expert Ecommerce and Portal Development Agency.
description:
PureNet is an expert Ecommerce and Portal Development Agency that specialises in award-winning, fully integrated solutions. 
PureNet has been delivering ecommerce and portal solutions to B2C and B2B businesses for over a decade and has experience working with a range of ecommerce platforms including Magento. 
PureNet’s clients range from High Street names such as Illamasqua and LighterLife to globally recognised brands including The Royal British Legion, Krispy Kreme and Tui.
